text.div:
Anaplasmosis (Tests for Anaplasma species Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    22797-5 Anaplasma marginale DNA [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    22798-3 Anaplasma marginale rRNA [Presence] in Tissue by Probe
    29560-0 Anaplasma phagocytophilum DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    30039-2 Anaplasma phagocytophilum DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    49122-5 Anaplasma sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Sequencing
    87558-3 Anaplasma phagocytophilum groEL gene [Presence] in Blood by NAA with non-probe detection
